Title: Chuye Dile Mon
Actors: Arifin Shuvo, Zakia Bari Momo, Iresh Zaker, Quazi Nawshaba Ahmed
Plot: Twist of fate brought Abir back to Hridoypur. There, he is determined to get his childhood revenge, but finds his childhood love Nila instead. Which will ultimately get priority in Abir's mind? Revenge or Love?
